fr: Conception du jeu, programmation : Arkatein, SaltyIsaac
pt: Design de jogos, programação: Arkatein, SaltyIsaac

key: Using audio and texture assets by Kenney
en: Using audio and texture assets by Kenney
fr: Utilisation des ressources audio et textures de Kenney
pt: Usando ativos de áudio e textura de Kenney

key: There is a spirit in this room.
en: There is a spirit in this room.
fr: Cette pièce est hantée par un esprit.

key: I know this kind of dangerous spirit.
en: I know this kind of dangerous spirit.
fr: Je connais bien ce genre d'esprits frappeurs.
pt: Eu conheço esse tipo de espírito perigoso.

key: I better play along for the time being.
en: I better play along for the time being.
fr: Je vais jouer le jeu pour le moment.
pt: É melhor eu jogar junto por enquanto.

key: I must figure out what it wants from me.
en: I must figure out what it wants from me.
fr: Je dois comprendre ce qu'il veut.
pt: Devo descobrir o que ele quer de mim.

key: Its twin should be nearby. Let's find it.
en: Its twin should be nearby. Let's find it.
fr: Son jumeau ne doit pas être très loin. Cherchons-le.
pt: Seu gêmeo deveria estar por perto. Vamos encontrá-lo.

key: This table should help me figure out where it wants things to go.
en: This table should help me figure out where it wants things to go.
fr: Cette table devrait m'aider à comprendre où il veut que je dispose les objets.
pt: Esta tabela deve me ajudar a descobrir para onde ela quer que as coisas vão.

key: Let's put something on that pedestal and ask directly.
en: Let's put something on that pedestal and ask directly.
fr: Mettons quelque chose sur ce piédestal pour de mander directement.
pt: Vamos colocar algo nesse pedestal e perguntar diretamente.

key: This trusty crystal ball will show me what I have yet to do.
en: This trusty crystal ball will show me what I have yet to do.
fr: Ma boule de cristal me montrera ce qu'il me reste à faire.
pt: Esta confiável bola de cristal me mostrará o que ainda tenho que fazer.

key: When I touch it, the images change...
en: When I touch it, the images change...
fr: Quand je la touche, les images changent...
pt: Quando toco nele, as imagens mudam...

key: It's trying to move the furniture around...?
en: It's trying to move the furniture around...?
fr: Il essaie de déplacer les objets... ?

key: It would be safer if I reordered the room myself.
en: It would be safer if I reordered the room myself.
fr: Il vaudrait mieux que je réarrange tout ça moi-même.
pt: Seria mais seguro se eu mesmo reorganizasse o quarto.
Vamos ver o que ele quer...

key: And now, while it's no longer paying attention...
en: And now, while it's no longer paying attention...
fr: Et maintenant qu'il a le dos tourné...
pt: E agora, enquanto não está mais prestando atenção...

fr: C'est le moment de s'en débarrasser !

key: And, well, my crystal ball is gone, too.
en: And, well, my crystal ball is gone, too.
fr: Et, euh, ma boule de cristal aussi, on dirait.
pt: E, bem, minha bola de cristal também desapareceu.

key: Oh well. What was I doing again?
en: Oh well. What was I doing again?
pt: Ah bem. O que eu estava fazendo de novo?
